attributes.action: call for a complete boycott of the beijing olympics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
China are one of the main supporters of the junta currently ruling Burma and are therefore China are key to any international action against the current regime. 

A complete boycott of the Beijing Olympic Games is perhaps the only way the West can excert enough pressure on China to withdraw their support and protection of the current regime in Burma.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
